scripts.watch: watchify Scripts/app/bootstrap.js -o Scripts/bundle.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] -v -d
scripts.build-dev: browserify Scripts/app/bootstrap.js -o Scripts/bundle.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] -d
scripts.build-prod: browserify Scripts/app/bootstrap.js -o Scripts/bundle.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] -d
